attributes.action: Enforce I'd verification to open a social media account on any platform
attributes.additional_details:
It will minimise online bullying, paedophiles having free reign over social platforms to groom children and teens. 
Protect kids, stop underage social use and toxicity in year groups, which is a leading contribution to mental health issues in children and young adults. 
Hold trolls accountable for their actions, helping the police to identify abusers and bullies.

Yes you have a right to be anonymous but if you really need to, don't use social media.
attributes.background:
Stop anyone from being able to set up social media without verifying their age and identity. 
Allow people the right to use a different name / alias but ensure there is an I'd verification behind each account.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625131
